Posts.Content: SonCallsMeEarl wrote: Hello all you "wonderful and strong" women!!!!   I've been reading a lot of your stories, and yes, now I am just like you, diagnosed with cancer. First question I have is: How do you come up with the ER+, PR, HER2, all those things that I don't see on my pathology report???? All mine says is "Grade 1 ductal carcinoma in-situ"  Thanks, My son calls me "Earl"   :) Earl Dx 8/11/2008, DCIS, 1cm, Stage 0, Grade 1, 0/0 nodes, ER+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pathology Report SonCallsMeEarl SonCallsMeEarl
